kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking path_url=/booking headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '181', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"firstname": "Ana", "lastname": "Rosa", "totalprice": 2222, "depositpaid": false, "bookingdates": {"checkin": "2024-01-01", "checkout": "2024-02-01"}, "additionalneeds": "Parking"}'

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Validate Json By Schema File
kw.doc: Validate json object by json schema file. Arguments: - json_object: json as a dictionary object. - json_path: path to file with json schema

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: GET
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/3178 path_url=/booking/3178 headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Dictionaries Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given dictionaries are not equal.
